sentences.en: Bree: Are you insane? Your thug tried to strangle him.
sentences.cn: 布雷: 你疯了? 你的暴徒试图扼杀他.

sentences.en: Get out, or I'll call the police , you thug.
He doesn't come across as the thug he's perceived to be.
sentences.cn: 他不像人们感觉的那样是个暴徒.

sentences.en: He edged away from the thug.
sentences.cn: 他悄悄地躲开了那个暴徒.

sentences.en: He was beaten up by a gang of young thugs.
sentences.cn: 他遭到一群小混混的痛打。

sentences.en: I'm still the thug you love to hate.
sentences.cn: 我仍然是那个你喜欢恨的暴徒.

sentences.en: Jansen, drunk thug outside Bradbury Bldg.
sentences.cn: 扬森, 喝醉了暴徒以外的白普理大厦.

sentences.en: She couldn't help screaming at the sight of that thug.
sentences.cn: 她一看到那个凶手,就忍不住尖叫起来.

sentences.en: So , what makes you any different from any other high school thug?
sentences.cn: 你和高中里的其它恶霸有什么区别?

sentences.en: The poor man received a savage beating from the thug.
sentences.cn: 那可怜的人被暴徒们毒打了一顿.

sentences.en: The thug gave him a punch in the chest.
sentences.cn: 暴徒对着他的胸部打了一拳.

sentences.en: The thug grappled him around the neck.
sentences.cn: 那个歹徒抓住了他的脖子.

sentences.en: The thug grasped the management rights by illegal means.
sentences.cn: 歹徒通过不法手段掌握管理权.

sentences.en: Thug: Well, let's see how she does against four men. Ha - ha.
sentences.cn: 流氓: 好呀, 咱们来看看她要如何一人对我们四个大男人. 哈哈.

sentences.en: Thug: Your girlfriend! Ha - ha. Don't make me laugh.
sentences.cn: 流氓: 你女友! 哈哈! 别让我笑掉大牙.

sentences.en: You still the same guy that got Thug Life tatted on his arm?
sentences.cn: 你还是那个会把「盗道」刺在自己手臂上的家伙 吗 ?
